name: Psychopath Hunt - Horror Game
description:
-------------------

Story:

An insane butcher has kidnapped a young woman and has locked her in her house, enter her infamous home and rescue the girl.

You will have to enter into that horror house and try to save the young girl that the Psychopath have kidnapped.

You only have 5:00 hours.

Good luck!

-------------------

Key Imputs:

- Space To Drop

- Left mouse click to fire/shoot

-  E to Interact

- C to crouch

-------------------

Credits:

A game developed by Frikjumno and distributed by MalomStudios
